GoodsName.fmg

fields.name: Ash of War_ Wild Strikes
fields.short_description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Heavy affinity and the following skill:
fields.description:
This Ash of War grants an armament the Heavy affinity and the following skill:

"Wild Strikes: Swing armament with wild abandon. Hold to continue swinging. Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack."

Usable on axes and hammers as well as curved swords and greatswords (colossal weapons excepted).

fields.name: Lost Ashes of War
fields.short_description: Empty ashes of war, devoid of any memories of battle.
fields.description:
Empty ashes of war, devoid of any memories of battle.

Unable to apply any kind of affinity in their current state, but can be used by Smithing Master Hewg of the Roundtable Hold to recreate other ashes.

Thus does the copy pass into becoming the genuine article.

fields.name: Alabaster Lord_s Sword
fields.short_description: Greatsword forged from a blue-white meteoric ore. The blade conceals gravity-manipulating magic.
fields.description:
Greatsword forged from a blue-white meteoric ore. The blade conceals gravity-manipulating magic.

A weapon unique to the Alabaster Lords, a race of ancients with skin of stone who were said to have risen to life when a meteor struck long ago.

fields.name: Antspur Rapier
fields.short_description: Spur of a giant ant which has been fashioned into a rapier. The blade drips with scarlet rot.
fields.description:
Spur of a giant ant which has been fashioned into a rapier. The blade drips with scarlet rot.

Scarlet rot is an old legend, of which Maleigh Marais of the Shaded Castle was a private believer. And indeed, he eventually found his own personal goddess.

fields.name: Axe of Godrick
fields.short_description: Greataxe wielded by Godrick the Grafted. This golden battleaxe is emblazoned with the figure of a beast, representing the strength of Godfrey, First Elden Lord and patriarch of the golden lineage.
fields.description:
Greataxe wielded by Godrick the Grafted. This golden battleaxe is emblazoned with the figure of a beast, representing the strength of Godfrey, First Elden Lord and patriarch of the golden lineage.

"I command thee kneel! For I am the lord of all that is golden!"

fields.name: Bandit_s Curved Sword
fields.short_description: Curved sword with a light, crescent-shaped blade. Used by the bandits who ran rampant in the wake of the Shattering.
fields.description:
Curved sword with a light, crescent-shaped blade. Used by the bandits who ran rampant in the wake of the Shattering.

Most of the blade is now darkened and covered in rust, but with enough dexterity this weapon may still stand up to some use.

fields.name: Banished Knight_s Greatsword
fields.short_description: A finely-crafted greatsword intricately engraved with an ancient motif. Given to knights who, whether by misfortune or misdeed, were forced to abandon their homes. Most of these knights were sent t...
fields.description: A finely-crafted greatsword intricately engraved with an ancient motif. Given to knights who, whether by misfortune or misdeed, were forced to abandon their homes. Most of these knights were sent to the fringes, where they were forced to start anew with only despair for company.

fields.name: Bastard Sword
fields.short_description: A large sword with a straight blade. This heavy sword is usually wielded with two hands, but for those with enough strength, one is sufficient.
fields.description:
A large sword with a straight blade. This heavy sword is usually wielded with two hands, but for those with enough strength, one is sufficient.

The hefty blade can be swung into multiple foes at once thanks to the broad, sweeping attack, making fending off crowds all the easier.

fields.name: Beast-Repellent Torch
fields.short_description: A torch which burns oil infused with a special incense. The aroma pacifies wild beasts.
fields.description:
A torch which burns oil infused with a special incense. The aroma pacifies wild beasts.

Torches such as these were used to keep unwelcome beasts away from treasure troves hidden in caves.

fields.name: Beastman_s Curved Sword
fields.short_description: Curved sword forged of dull iron wielded by the beastmen of Farum Azula.
fields.description:
Curved sword forged of dull iron wielded by the beastmen of Farum Azula.

The blade is heavy but well-balanced. Comparatively easy to wield for the damage it delivers.

fields.name: Black Knife
fields.short_description: Dagger once belonging to one of the assassins who murdered Godwyn the Golden on the Night of the Black Knives.
fields.description:
Dagger once belonging to one of the assassins who murdered Godwyn the Golden on the Night of the Black Knives.

A ritual performed on the oddly misshapen blade imbued it with the power of the stolen Rune of Death.

fields.name: Blade of Calling
fields.short_description: Dagger given to one who set out on a journey to fulfill her duty long ago. The power of its former owner, the kindling maiden, is still apparent.
fields.description:
Dagger given to one who set out on a journey to fulfill her duty long ago. The power of its former owner, the kindling maiden, is still apparent.

The one who walks alongside flame, Shall one day meet the road of Destined Death.

fields.name: Blasphemous Blade
fields.short_description: Sacred sword of Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy. Remains of the countless heroes he has devoured writhe upon the surface of this blade.
fields.description:
Sacred sword of Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy. Remains of the countless heroes he has devoured writhe upon the surface of this blade.

Now they share the same blood, bound together as family. Some HP is restored upon defeating an enemy.

fields.name: Bloodhound_s Fang
fields.short_description: Curved greatsword with a gently undulating blade wielded by Bloodhound Knights.
fields.description:
Curved greatsword with a gently undulating blade wielded by Bloodhound Knights.

A fearsome blade capable of brutal airborne attacks.

fields.name: Bloodstained Dagger
fields.short_description: Dagger with a bloodstained blade. Afflicts targets with blood loss.
fields.description:
Dagger with a bloodstained blade. Afflicts targets with blood loss.

As blood darkened the dagger through repeated slashing and stabbing, its blade only grew sharper and harder.

fields.name: Bloody Helice
fields.short_description: Ominous piercing sword with a winding blade. Carried by the noble servants of the Lord of Blood.
fields.description:
Ominous piercing sword with a winding blade. Carried by the noble servants of the Lord of Blood.

Designed to bore into flesh, causing severe blood loss at the wound. The extracted blood trickles gracefully down the length of the blade.

fields.name: Bolt of Gransax
fields.short_description: Spear whittled from the weapon wielded by Gransax. One of the legendary armaments.
fields.description:
Spear whittled from the weapon wielded by Gransax. One of the legendary armaments.

A great ancient dragon, Gransax once rained calamity upon the Royal Capitalthe only time in historical record that Leyndell's walls have fallen. This marked the dawn of the war against the ancient dragons.

fields.name: Broadsword
fields.short_description: A straight sword with a wide blade, suited to slashing attacks.
fields.description:
A straight sword with a wide blade, suited to slashing attacks.

Horizontal swings boast wide attack range, making it easier to connect with foes.

fields.name: Caestus
fields.short_description: A weapon built for striking with the fists, made of tough leather inlaid with iron rivets.
fields.description:
A weapon built for striking with the fists, made of tough leather inlaid with iron rivets.

Fist weapons come in pairs, and two-handing this weapon will equip it to both hands.

fields.name: Cane Sword
fields.short_description: Beloved sword of an aged knight whose last quest was long behind him, repurposed into a walking stick. The tip is rather worn.
fields.description:
Beloved sword of an aged knight whose last quest was long behind him, repurposed into a walking stick. The tip is rather worn.

Though bent of back and without the brawn required even to raise the sword aloft, still he wished to meet his end with weapon in hand.

fields.name: Carian Knight_s Sword
fields.short_description: Straight sword embedded with a blue glintstone. Weapon of knights sworn to Carian royalty.
fields.description:
Straight sword embedded with a blue glintstone. Weapon of knights sworn to Carian royalty.

These knights' swords could serve as catalysts, letting them wield sorcerous battle skills. Despite numbering fewer than twenty, this power made them a match for even the champions of gold in battle.

fields.name: Celebrant_s Sickle
fields.short_description: Sickle decorated with flowers and many-colored fabrics. Ceremonial tool used by dancers during the festivities of Dominula. Its attacks can slip through an enemy's guard.
fields.description:
Sickle decorated with flowers and many-colored fabrics. Ceremonial tool used by dancers during the festivities of Dominula. Its attacks can slip through an enemy's guard.

Crafted from human bone. Grants trace amounts of runes on landing attacks.

fields.name: Cinquedea
fields.short_description: Short sword given to high ranking clergymen of Farum Azula. Raises potency of bestial incantations.
fields.description:
Short sword given to high ranking clergymen of Farum Azula. Raises potency of bestial incantations.

The design celebrates a beast's five fingers, symbolic of the intelligence once granted upon their kind.

fields.name: Claymore
fields.short_description: A large sword with a long, straight blade. This heavy sword is usually wielded with two hands, but for those with enough strength, one is sufficient.
fields.description:
A large sword with a long, straight blade. This heavy sword is usually wielded with two hands, but for those with enough strength, one is sufficient.

In addition to the heavy sweeping attacks, it can also make a heavy piercing thrust, making this a versatile weapon.

fields.name: Cleanrot Knight_s Sword
fields.short_description: Piercing sword of the Cleanrot Knights who fought alongside Malenia, Blade of Miquella.
fields.description:
Piercing sword of the Cleanrot Knights who fought alongside Malenia, Blade of Miquella.

Mainly used as a backup weapon, in combination with a long-handled armament.

fields.name: Club
fields.short_description: A thick, solid lump of wood. Wielding this striking weapon requires no skill.
fields.description:
A thick, solid lump of wood. Wielding this striking weapon requires no skill.

A simple, primitive weapon that requires only brute strength and persistence to hammer your foe into the ground.

fields.name: Coded Sword
fields.short_description: Hidden sword once granted to the Tarnished of the Roundtable by the Two Fingers. A formless cipher comprises its blade, which deals holy damage no shield can repel. Champions would gather at the Ro...
fields.description: Hidden sword once granted to the Tarnished of the Roundtable by the Two Fingers. A formless cipher comprises its blade, which deals holy damage no shield can repel. Champions would gather at the Roundtable Hold in days long past, when the Two Fingers were masters of oration, their flesh yet full of vigor.

fields.name: Commander_s Standard
fields.short_description: A beaten red battle standard is furled around this time-worn halberd.
fields.description:
A beaten red battle standard is furled around this time-worn halberd.

Even after his lord was fled, Commander O'Neil continued to brandish this flag in the devastation of the rot-eaten field of battle, the sole veteran who remembers this battle with pride.

fields.name: Crystal Knife
fields.short_description: A knife made by sharpening hard crystal. Signature weapon of glintstone miners.
fields.description:
A knife made by sharpening hard crystal. Signature weapon of glintstone miners.

Used as tool to extract glintstone from broken rock, and as such a faint magic enwreathes the blade.

fields.name: Crystal Staff
fields.short_description: Staff fashioned from pure crystal; a deed impossible for a human. Enhances Crystalian sorceries.
fields.description:
Staff fashioned from pure crystal; a deed impossible for a human. Enhances Crystalian sorceries.

The Crystalian's faint cogitation is known as the "wisdom of stone." This staff can only be wielded by those of intellect high enough to grasp such wisdom.

fields.name: Crystal Sword
fields.short_description: Sword fashioned from pure crystal; a deed impossible for a human. Enwreathed with powerful magic, its attack scales with intelligence. The inscrutable Crystalians have but one clear purpose; to saf...
fields.description: Sword fashioned from pure crystal; a deed impossible for a human. Enwreathed with powerful magic, its attack scales with intelligence. The inscrutable Crystalians have but one clear purpose; to safeguard their crystals unto the end. One theory posits that they yearn for the return of their creator who will carve for them new brethren.

fields.name: Curved Club
fields.short_description: Hard, curved club, shaped like a crescent moon.
fields.description:
Hard, curved club, shaped like a crescent moon.

Wielded instead of a curved sword by Albinaurics lacking dexterity. The only point of similarity between the two is the shape.

fields.name: Dagger
fields.short_description: A standard dagger with a straight blade.
fields.description:
A standard dagger with a straight blade.

Though modest in reach and capacity for harm, this weapon is light enough to jab in rapid succession and delivers devastating critical hits.

fields.name: Dark Moon Greatsword
fields.short_description: A Moon Greatsword, bestowed by a Carian queen upon her spouse to honor long-standing tradition. One of the legendary armaments.
fields.description:
A Moon Greatsword, bestowed by a Carian queen upon her spouse to honor long-standing tradition. One of the legendary armaments.

Ranni's sigil is a full moon, cold and leaden, and this sword is but a beam of its light.

fields.name: Death_s Poker
fields.short_description: Barbed rod carried by Deathbirds.
fields.description:
Barbed rod carried by Deathbirds.

The birds are graveyard fire keepers; it is said they rake out the ashen remains of the dead from their kilns.

fields.name: Devourer_s Scepter
fields.short_description: Scepter in the shape of a serpent devouring the world. This weapon will one day become the very symbol of the Lord of Blasphemy. One of the legendary armaments.
fields.description:
Scepter in the shape of a serpent devouring the world. This weapon will one day become the very symbol of the Lord of Blasphemy. One of the legendary armaments.

A vision of the future briefly seen by Rykard in his final moments before being devoured by the great serpent.

fields.name: Dismounter
fields.short_description: This curved greatsword wielded by the brawny sellswords of Kaiden combines the blade of a scimitar with the heft of a hatchet.
fields.description:
This curved greatsword wielded by the brawny sellswords of Kaiden combines the blade of a scimitar with the heft of a hatchet.

A difficult to handle weapon that demands much of the wielder's strength and dexterity, but with practice and ability, it can serve as a versatile weapon even on horseback.

fields.name: Dragon King_s Cragblade
fields.short_description: Piercing Gravel Stone sword containing primeval lightning. A portion of the Dragonlord's power, gained from a remembrance.
fields.description:
Piercing Gravel Stone sword containing primeval lightning. A portion of the Dragonlord's power, gained from a remembrance.

This weapon commands great power over the paltry, mortal dragons of today.

fields.name: Dragonscale Blade
fields.short_description: A weapon made by sharpening a Gravel Stone scale, thought to be the source of ancient dragon immortality, into an unclouded blade.
fields.description:
A weapon made by sharpening a Gravel Stone scale, thought to be the source of ancient dragon immortality, into an unclouded blade.

Alas, the Dragonkin Soldiers never attained immortality, and perished as decrepit, pale imitations of their skyborn kin.

fields.name: Eclipse Shotel
fields.short_description: Storied sword and treasure of Castle Sol that depicts an eclipsed sun drained of color. One of the legendary armaments.
fields.description:
Storied sword and treasure of Castle Sol that depicts an eclipsed sun drained of color. One of the legendary armaments.

In Sol, the sight of an eclipse inspires a dreadful awe, preventing an onlooker from averting his gaze.

fields.name: Eleonora_s Poleblade
fields.short_description: Twinned naginata forged in the Land of Reeds. Chosen weapon of Eleonora, Violet Bloody Finger.
fields.description:
Twinned naginata forged in the Land of Reeds. Chosen weapon of Eleonora, Violet Bloody Finger.

Her mastery of the sword was such that her onslaught was likened to a whirlwind, but now her legacy is stained by accursed blood.

fields.name: Erdsteel Dagger
fields.short_description: An erdsteel dagger with a grass crest engraved upon its blade. Carried by the Erdtree royalty for self-defense in times of peace.
fields.description:
An erdsteel dagger with a grass crest engraved upon its blade. Carried by the Erdtree royalty for self-defense in times of peace.

Though forged to a high standard, the weapon is difficult to wield. Attack power also scales with faith.

fields.name: Estoc
fields.short_description: Large piercing sword with a long, hard bladed edge which is also capable of slashing attacks.
fields.description:
Large piercing sword with a long, hard bladed edge which is also capable of slashing attacks.

For its large size, it can be wielded rather nimbly, leaving little opportunity for the enemy to counter.

fields.name: Falchion
fields.short_description: A curved sword with a single-sided blade. Delivers slashing attacks with its sharp blade, but is ineffective against thick armor and hides covered in tough scales.
fields.description:
A curved sword with a single-sided blade. Delivers slashing attacks with its sharp blade, but is ineffective against thick armor and hides covered in tough scales.

Wielders of the weapon employ a unique style that enhances attacks with spinning motions.

fields.name: Family Heads
fields.short_description: Three bludgeoning copper heads attached to a handle by chains. Signature weapon of Necromancer Garris, the heretical sage.
fields.description:
Three bludgeoning copper heads attached to a handle by chains. Signature weapon of Necromancer Garris, the heretical sage.

The heads were made to resemble those of his wife and two children.

fields.name: Flail
fields.short_description: Weapon consisting of a bludgeoning head attached to a handle by a chain. The iron ball is spiked and induces blood loss.
fields.description:
Weapon consisting of a bludgeoning head attached to a handle by a chain. The iron ball is spiked and induces blood loss.

Blows from this weapon cannot be parried. The charge attack whirls the iron ball around for increased force before striking.

fields.name: Flamberge
fields.short_description: Greatsword featuring a flame-like undulation. Shreds enemy flesh, inducing blood loss.
fields.description:
Greatsword featuring a flame-like undulation. Shreds enemy flesh, inducing blood loss.

Scarlet rot is kept at bay with flame at Redmane Castle, and as such, this beloved sword of Jerren's eventually became the symbol of the castle itself.

fields.name: Flowing Curved Sword
fields.short_description: Legends speak of a master of the sword garbed in blue, and his curved blade that was patterned after flowing water.
fields.description:
Legends speak of a master of the sword garbed in blue, and his curved blade that was patterned after flowing water.

Strong attack unleashes a series of strikes akin to a dance, offering a glimpse into the legend.

fields.name: Forked Greatsword
fields.short_description: Oddly shaped greatsword wielded by imps.
fields.description:
Oddly shaped greatsword wielded by imps.

The gently undulating forked blade is known as an "imp's tongue" and causes blood loss.

fields.name: Forked Hatchet
fields.short_description: Peculiar hatchet wielded by imps.
fields.description:
Peculiar hatchet wielded by imps.

The gently undulating forked blade is known as an "imp's tongue" and causes blood loss.

fields.name: Frozen Needle
fields.short_description: A razor-thin piercing blade of ice. Forged by Iji, the Carian Royal Blacksmith.
fields.description:
A razor-thin piercing blade of ice. Forged by Iji, the Carian Royal Blacksmith.

Can inflict frost upon enemies, and launch its blade with a strong attack. The blade immediately regenerates.

fields.name: Gargoyle_s Black Blades
fields.short_description: Bronze twinblade wielded by Valiant Gargoyle, mended with blackened corpse wax. Deals holy damage.
fields.description:
Bronze twinblade wielded by Valiant Gargoyle, mended with blackened corpse wax. Deals holy damage.

Such is the mark of those who serve Maliketh, the Black Blade.

fields.name: Gargoyle_s Blackblade
fields.short_description: Bronze greatsword wielded by Valiant Gargoyle, mended with blackened corpse wax. Deals holy damage.
fields.description:
Bronze greatsword wielded by Valiant Gargoyle, mended with blackened corpse wax. Deals holy damage.

Such is the mark of those who serve Maliketh, the Black Blade.

fields.name: Gargoyle_s Greatsword
fields.short_description: Bronze greatsword wielded by Valiant Gargoyle.
fields.description:
Bronze greatsword wielded by Valiant Gargoyle.

Just like the wielder, the missing parts have been mended with corpse wax; a patchwork of champions.

fields.name: Gargoyle_s Twinblade
fields.short_description: Bronze twinblade wielded by Valiant Gargoyle.
fields.description:
Bronze twinblade wielded by Valiant Gargoyle.

Just like the wielder, the missing parts have been mended with corpse wax; a patchwork of champions.

fields.name: Ghostflame Torch
fields.short_description: Metal torch that burns with cold ghostflame. Tool of the Fallen Hawks who prowl the underground rivers. When the band's last embers were used up in their long search, they began to burn the bones o...
fields.description: Metal torch that burns with cold ghostflame. Tool of the Fallen Hawks who prowl the underground rivers. When the band's last embers were used up in their long search, they began to burn the bones of their fellows, acquiring the cold ghostflame, but sealing their fate as dwellers of the underground for all eternity.

fields.name: Giant-Crusher
fields.short_description: A hammer made from a boulder, used in the War against the Giants. One of the heftiest weapons in the entire Lands Between. After the giants were quelled, and man turned against man in violence, thi...
fields.description: A hammer made from a boulder, used in the War against the Giants. One of the heftiest weapons in the entire Lands Between. After the giants were quelled, and man turned against man in violence, this weapon was all but forgotten. Man has grown feeble in comparison to his forebears.

fields.name: Giant_s Red Braid
fields.short_description: Hefty whip woven from the flame-red hair of a Fire Giant.
fields.description:
Hefty whip woven from the flame-red hair of a Fire Giant.

Every giant is red of hair, and Radagon was said to have despised his own red locks. Perhaps that was a curse of their kind.

fields.name: Glintstone Kris
fields.short_description: Ritual blade once presented to Leyndell by the Academy of Raya Lucaria to celebrate their newfound peace. Though the weapon is embedded with precious glintstones and features Erdtree ornamentation,...
fields.description: Ritual blade once presented to Leyndell by the Academy of Raya Lucaria to celebrate their newfound peace. Though the weapon is embedded with precious glintstones and features Erdtree ornamentation, the undulating blade is symbolic of an ancient ritual.

fields.name: Glintstone Staff
fields.short_description: Staff with a glintstone embedded at the tip. A catalyst for casting sorceries.
fields.description:
Staff with a glintstone embedded at the tip. A catalyst for casting sorceries.

Sorceries must be memorized first at a site of lost grace, and a staff must be equipped to cast them.

fields.name: Godskin Peeler
fields.short_description: Unique twinblade wielded by Godskin Apostles characterized by its disturbing design. One end features a sickle for slicing attacks while the other boasts a winding spike for boring into flesh.
fields.description:
Unique twinblade wielded by Godskin Apostles characterized by its disturbing design. One end features a sickle for slicing attacks while the other boasts a winding spike for boring into flesh.

Much skill is required to wield this weapon due to its asymmetric nature.

fields.name: Godskin Stitcher
fields.short_description: Elegant piercing sword with a celadon colored blade wielded by Godskin Nobles.
fields.description:
Elegant piercing sword with a celadon colored blade wielded by Godskin Nobles.

The nobles possess skill with the sword unmatched by any lowborn. Despite its size, successive attacks from this weapon are swifter than the eye can follow.

fields.name: Godslayer_s Greatsword
fields.short_description: Sacred sword of the Dusk-Eyed Queen who controlled the Godskin Apostles before her defeat at the hands of Maliketh.
fields.description:
Sacred sword of the Dusk-Eyed Queen who controlled the Godskin Apostles before her defeat at the hands of Maliketh.

The black flames wielded by the apostles are channeled from this sword.

fields.name: Golden Epitaph
fields.short_description: A sword made to commemorate the death of Godwyn the Golden, first of the demigods to die.
fields.description:
A sword made to commemorate the death of Godwyn the Golden, first of the demigods to die.

Infused with the humble prayer of a young boy; "O brother, lord brother, please die a true death."

fields.name: Golden Halberd
fields.short_description: Weighty halberd forged of gold. Wielded by the Order of Tree Sentinels, heavily equipped knights. Deals holy damage.
fields.description:
Weighty halberd forged of gold. Wielded by the Order of Tree Sentinels, heavily equipped knights. Deals holy damage.

A masterfully crafted weapon that lives up to its heft, but is difficult for one of mere human strength to wield.

fields.name: Grafted Blade Greatsword
fields.short_description: The storied sword of Castle Morne. A revenger's weapon, it is burdened with oceans of anger and regret. One of the legendary armaments.
fields.description:
The storied sword of Castle Morne. A revenger's weapon, it is burdened with oceans of anger and regret. One of the legendary armaments.

A lone surviving champion from a country now vanished was so determined to continue fighting that he claimed the swords of an entire clan of warriors.

fields.name: Grafted Dragon
fields.short_description: The embodiment of the power that still remained in the dragon's head that was grafted to Godrick's left arm.
fields.description:
The embodiment of the power that still remained in the dragon's head that was grafted to Godrick's left arm.

The wielder's arm will take the form of a small dragon, sprouting sharp dragon fangs at the fist. This weapon cannot be two-handed.

fields.name: Great Knife
fields.short_description: Large knife with a broad, curved blade.
fields.description:
Large knife with a broad, curved blade.

This weapon is designed to slash and rend, inflicting blood loss upon the recipient.

fields.name: Great Omenkiller Cleaver
fields.short_description: The blade of this huge, loathsome cleaver comprises a row of amputated Omen horns. Weapon of slaughter wielded by Omenkillers.
fields.description:
The blade of this huge, loathsome cleaver comprises a row of amputated Omen horns. Weapon of slaughter wielded by Omenkillers.

The hideous horns cause blood loss, adding vibrant colors to the ongoing mayhem.

fields.name: Great Stars
fields.short_description: Huge bludgeon with three stars at the striking end. Though primarily a striking weapon, the stars' spikes cause blood loss.
fields.description:
Huge bludgeon with three stars at the striking end. Though primarily a striking weapon, the stars' spikes cause blood loss.

A blood-stained star is an ill omen, a fact not lost upon those against whom this weapon is brought to bear. Landing attacks slightly restores HP.

fields.name: Great pe
fields.short_description: Large rapier featuring a thin, sharp blade. Commonly used in life or death duels.
fields.description:
Large rapier featuring a thin, sharp blade. Commonly used in life or death duels.

Like its smaller counterparts, it is made for thrusting attacks, and can be used while guarding with a shield.

fields.name: Greatsword
fields.short_description: A coarse iron lump of an ultra greatsword. Mows down foes by utilizing its incredible weight.
fields.description:
A coarse iron lump of an ultra greatsword. Mows down foes by utilizing its incredible weight.

Though handling it likely requires the wielder to have surpassed the realm of the merely human, it is precisely for this reason the weapon is used to slaughter even inhuman foes.

fields.name: Grossmesser
fields.short_description: Curved sword boasting a large blade. This weapon is designed to make use of its weight in combination with its sharp cutting edge.
fields.description:
Curved sword boasting a large blade. This weapon is designed to make use of its weight in combination with its sharp cutting edge.

A thoroughly reliable choice of weapon for those who can master its particulars.

fields.name: Hand of Malenia
fields.short_description: Blade built into Malenia's prosthetic arm. Through consecration it is resistant to rot.
fields.description:
Blade built into Malenia's prosthetic arm. Through consecration it is resistant to rot.

Malenia's war prosthesis symbolized her victories. Some claim to have seen wings when the weapon was raised aloft; wings of fierce determination that have never known defeat.

fields.name: Helphen_s Steeple
fields.short_description: Greatsword patterned after the black steeple of the Helphen, the lampwood which guides the dead of the spirit world.
fields.description:
Greatsword patterned after the black steeple of the Helphen, the lampwood which guides the dead of the spirit world.

The lamplight is similar to grace in appearance, only it is said that it can only be seen by those who met their death in battle.

fields.name: Inseparable Sword
fields.short_description: Sword forged by compounding silver and gold. A sacred weapon to hunt Those Who Live in Death. Deals holy damage.
fields.description:
Sword forged by compounding silver and gold. A sacred weapon to hunt Those Who Live in Death. Deals holy damage.

The inseparable twins found solace in the Golden Order, the only institution not to revile them as accursed beings.

fields.name: Iron Greatsword
fields.short_description: Greatsword with a blade of unusually thick steel. A coarse weapon to which polishing is a foreign concept.
fields.description:
Greatsword with a blade of unusually thick steel. A coarse weapon to which polishing is a foreign concept.

Weighty even among others of its class, the impact of each strike is sure to be felt.

fields.name: Ivory Sickle
fields.short_description: Sickle fashioned from ivory. Weapon carried by aged Albinaurics.
fields.description:
Sickle fashioned from ivory. Weapon carried by aged Albinaurics.

These weapons are evidence of their dedication to the Haligtree, despite never having entered its presence.

fields.name: Knight_s Greatsword
fields.short_description: Greatsword bestowed upon skilled swordsmen in the demigods' service, and yet had no rank or title.
fields.description:
Greatsword bestowed upon skilled swordsmen in the demigods' service, and yet had no rank or title.

Featuring a long grip enabling dual-handed use, this weapon was designed to dispatch larger foes. Being charged with such a duty was undoubtedly a great honor.

fields.name: Lazuli Glintstone Sword
fields.short_description: A sword with a glintstone in its handguards. Wielded by scholars of the Lazuli Conspectus who seek to master Carian sorcery. Deals magic damage.
fields.description:
A sword with a glintstone in its handguards. Wielded by scholars of the Lazuli Conspectus who seek to master Carian sorcery. Deals magic damage.

Apparently once used as a staff of sorcery, this sword is made of wood.

fields.name: Longsword
fields.short_description: A straight sword with a double-edged blade.
fields.description:
A straight sword with a double-edged blade.

In addition to its reliable standard damage, this weapon also boasts powerful piercing attacks. A superbly balanced armament.

fields.name: Lordsworn_s Greatsword
fields.short_description: Well-crafted straight sword with an illustrious design, wielded by regulars of a lord's army.
fields.description:
Well-crafted straight sword with an illustrious design, wielded by regulars of a lord's army.

Though blackened and damaged by years of use, it appears to have otherwise been kept in a serviceable condition, despite the soldiers having long since lost their minds.

fields.name: Lordsworn_s Straight Sword
fields.short_description: Well-crafted straight sword with an illustrious design, wielded by regulars of a lord's army.
fields.description:
Well-crafted straight sword with an illustrious design, wielded by regulars of a lord's army.

Though blackened and damaged by years of use, it appears to have otherwise been kept in a serviceable condition, despite the soldiers having long since lost their minds.

fields.name: Magma Blade
fields.short_description: Curved sword with a blade fashioned from the lava of Mt. Gelmir. An armament of the man-serpents, impossible for a human to have made.
fields.description:
Curved sword with a blade fashioned from the lava of Mt. Gelmir. An armament of the man-serpents, impossible for a human to have made.

Deals fire damage.

fields.name: Magma Wyrm_s Scalesword
fields.short_description: Curved greatsword wielded by Magma Wyrms. The shape resembles a dragon's jaw and is covered in hard scales.
fields.description:
Curved greatsword wielded by Magma Wyrms. The shape resembles a dragon's jaw and is covered in hard scales.

It's said these land-bound dragons were once humans heroes who partook in dragon communion, a grave transgression for which they were cursed to crawl the earth upon their bellies, shadows of their former selves.

fields.name: Maliketh_s Black Blade
fields.short_description: Maliketh's black blade which once harbored the power of the Rune of Death. A sad shadow of its former glory.
fields.description:
Maliketh's black blade which once harbored the power of the Rune of Death. A sad shadow of its former glory.

After a fragment of Death was stolen on that fateful night, Maliketh bound the blade within his own flesh, such that none might ever rob Death again.

fields.name: Mantis Blade
fields.short_description: A curved sword with a blade at both ends wielded by the Cemetery Shades, the insect-ridden grave keepers.
fields.description:
A curved sword with a blade at both ends wielded by the Cemetery Shades, the insect-ridden grave keepers.

The blade is thin and sharp, and strong attack unleashes a far-reaching slash.

fields.name: Marais Executioner_s Sword
fields.short_description: Storied sword of House Marais, the family of executioners who presided over the Shaded Castle. One of the legendary armaments.
fields.description:
Storied sword of House Marais, the family of executioners who presided over the Shaded Castle. One of the legendary armaments.

Elemer of the Briar, the Bell Bearing Hunter, snatched the sword from the site of his looming execution, and furnished it with battle skills from his home of Eochaid.

fields.name: Meteoric Ore Blade
fields.short_description: Katana forged from meteoric ore to dispatch lifeforms born of falling stars. Deals magic damage.
fields.description:
Katana forged from meteoric ore to dispatch lifeforms born of falling stars. Deals magic damage.

The blade is weighty, known to deliver slashes of such ferocity that the impact is said to resemble the crash of a falling meteor.

fields.name: Miquellan Knight_s Sword
fields.short_description: Sword forged by servants of Miquella of the Haligtree, with a design modeled after those carried by Carian knights. Instead of glintstone however, amber from the Haligtree is embedded in the blade.
fields.description:
Sword forged by servants of Miquella of the Haligtree, with a design modeled after those carried by Carian knights. Instead of glintstone however, amber from the Haligtree is embedded in the blade.

A sumptuous piece, yet it has never been offered to any knightan ill-starred sword with no master.

fields.name: Misricorde
fields.short_description: Dagger favored by military physicians in white. The pointed blade is hard and sharp, making critical hits especially potent.
fields.description:
Dagger favored by military physicians in white. The pointed blade is hard and sharp, making critical hits especially potent.

Medicine is mercy, and mercy upon the battlefield is ruthless. Beware the killers clothed as men of compassion.

fields.name: Monk_s Flameblade
fields.short_description: Curved sword with a flickering flame motif. Wielded by the Fire Monks who came from the Mountaintops of the Giants.
fields.description:
Curved sword with a flickering flame motif. Wielded by the Fire Monks who came from the Mountaintops of the Giants.

The monks came to the land of Liurnia in pursuit of a fugitive who stole their fire.

fields.name: Moonveil
fields.short_description: Katana forged of glintstone. Masterpiece of a Sellian swordsmith.
fields.description:
Katana forged of glintstone. Masterpiece of a Sellian swordsmith.

Light enwreathes the blade when sheathed, explaining its Moonveil moniker.

fields.name: Morgott_s Cursed Sword
fields.short_description: Warped blade of shifting hue used by Morgott, the Omen King.
fields.description:
Warped blade of shifting hue used by Morgott, the Omen King.

The accursed blood that Morgott recanted and sealed away reformed into this blade.

fields.name: Nagakiba
fields.short_description: Katana with a ferociously long blade. Signature weapon of Yura, hunter of Bloody Fingers.
fields.description:
Katana with a ferociously long blade. Signature weapon of Yura, hunter of Bloody Fingers.

Reminiscent of a reinforced spear, its imposing length can be put to good use with powerful thrusting attacks.

fields.name: Noble_s Estoc
fields.short_description: Estoc carried by wandering nobles. Made to be easy to wield.
fields.description:
Estoc carried by wandering nobles. Made to be easy to wield.

Daubed with gold from tip to tail, it should fetch a good sum.

fields.name: Noble_s Slender Sword
fields.short_description: Narrow blade carried by wandering nobles. Made to be easy to wield.
fields.description:
Narrow blade carried by wandering nobles. Made to be easy to wield.

Daubed with gold from tip to tail, it should fetch a good sum.

fields.name: Nox Flowing Sword
fields.short_description: A grim weapon wielded by swordsmen of the Eternal City, this shotel has a blade as fine as a needle.
fields.description:
A grim weapon wielded by swordsmen of the Eternal City, this shotel has a blade as fine as a needle.

Forged from the liquid metal of a Silver Tear, it is thoroughly tempered until hardened.

fields.name: Omen Cleaver
fields.short_description: Heavy-bladed curved sword of colossal size awarded to Omen as a tool of war. This weapon is made to take advantage of brute strength.
fields.description:
Heavy-bladed curved sword of colossal size awarded to Omen as a tool of war. This weapon is made to take advantage of brute strength.

The pattern etched upon the blade is the remnant of a deteriorative malediction. Indeed, when bestowing a weapon, preparations must be made for taking it away.

fields.name: Onyx Lord_s Greatsword
fields.short_description: Greatsword forged from golden-hued meteoric ore. The blade conceals gravity-manipulating magic.
fields.description:
Greatsword forged from golden-hued meteoric ore. The blade conceals gravity-manipulating magic.

A weapon unique to the Onyx Lords, a race of ancients with skin of stone who were said to have risen to life when a meteor struck long ago.

fields.name: Ordovis_s Greatsword
fields.short_description: Greatsword of Ordovis, one of the two honored as foremost among the Crucible Knights.
fields.description:
Greatsword of Ordovis, one of the two honored as foremost among the Crucible Knights.

This sword is imbued with an ancient holy essence. Its red tint exemplifies the nature of primordial gold, said to be close in nature to life itself.

fields.name: Ornamental Straight Sword
fields.short_description: Slender straight sword patterned after an antique ornament. Superior swordsmen prefer to wield one in each hand.
fields.description:
Slender straight sword patterned after an antique ornament. Superior swordsmen prefer to wield one in each hand.

After falling from grace, the dregs of the golden lineage sought power and purpose in the past.

fields.name: Parrying Dagger
fields.short_description: A knife with curved handguards. Designed to parry, turning foes' attacks against them.
fields.description:
A knife with curved handguards. Designed to parry, turning foes' attacks against them.

For masters of combat who anticipate every enemy strike and counter accordingly, this weapon is all they need.

fields.name: Pest_s Glaive
fields.short_description: Glaive made from a hard, sharpened shell. Wielded by the pests who emerged from the Swamp of Aeonia. Slightly increases non-physical damage negation.
fields.description:
Glaive made from a hard, sharpened shell. Wielded by the pests who emerged from the Swamp of Aeonia. Slightly increases non-physical damage negation.

Though men might recognize the keen intellect of the pests evidenced by this spear's uncanny design, it will never be understood by them.

fields.name: Rapier
fields.short_description: A piercing sword with a sharp, slender blade. In addition to this weapon's thrusting attack prowess, it also boasts the ability to be used while guarding with a shield.
fields.description:
A piercing sword with a sharp, slender blade. In addition to this weapon's thrusting attack prowess, it also boasts the ability to be used while guarding with a shield.

As one of the smaller piercing swords, quick successive thrusts are easy to perform, but without a cutting edge, it cannot be used for slashing attacks.

fields.name: Reduvia
fields.short_description: Jagged dagger with a distinctive curved blade. Used by the noble servants of the Lord of Blood.
fields.description:
Jagged dagger with a distinctive curved blade. Used by the noble servants of the Lord of Blood.

This dagger rips the flesh as it enters, inflicting blood loss with sickening efficacy. A proud testament to the success of its vicious design, this weapon is perpetually coated in blood.

fields.name: Regalia of Eochaid
fields.short_description: Treasured sword of Eochaid, a lesser, long-vanished domain. The copper coloration is not to be confused for rust, but is a conduit for its wielder to move it by their will alone.
fields.description:
Treasured sword of Eochaid, a lesser, long-vanished domain. The copper coloration is not to be confused for rust, but is a conduit for its wielder to move it by their will alone.

Swords of Eochaid dance through the skies.

fields.name: Ringed Finger
fields.short_description: Bludgeon made of an enormous finger sheathed in several heavy rings. Thought to have been cut from an ancestor of the Fingercreeper.
fields.description:
Bludgeon made of an enormous finger sheathed in several heavy rings. Thought to have been cut from an ancestor of the Fingercreeper.

Some life yet remains in this legacy of an ancient act of blasphemy, as evidenced by the barely perceptible warmth it still exudes.

fields.name: Ripple Blade
fields.short_description: Unique weapon wielded by young Albinaurics, this sword is modelled after the ripples that are thought to be the origin of their species.
fields.description:
Unique weapon wielded by young Albinaurics, this sword is modelled after the ripples that are thought to be the origin of their species.

Its attack power is greatly enhanced with one's arcane attribute.

fields.name: Rivers of Blood
fields.short_description: Weapon of Okina, swordsman from the Land of Reeds. A cursed weapon that has felled countless men.
fields.description:
Weapon of Okina, swordsman from the Land of Reeds. A cursed weapon that has felled countless men.

When Mohg, the Lord of Blood, first felt Okina's sword, and madness, upon his flesh, he had a proposal, to offer Okina the life of a demon, whose thirst would never go unsated.

fields.name: Rogier_s Rapier
fields.short_description: Piercing sword of superior quality, featuring intricate ornamentation. Signature weapon of the sorcerer Rogier.
fields.description:
Piercing sword of superior quality, featuring intricate ornamentation. Signature weapon of the sorcerer Rogier.

High dexterity is required to wield the blade to its full potential, but mastery is a sight to behold, characterized by a flowing style which excels in successive attacks.

fields.name: Rosus_ Axe
fields.short_description: Usher of Death, Rosus, who shows the path to the catacombs throughout the Lands Between, is depicted on this ritual axe.
fields.description:
Usher of Death, Rosus, who shows the path to the catacombs throughout the Lands Between, is depicted on this ritual axe.

The dead easily lose their way, and have always been in sore need of a guiding hand.

fields.name: Rotten Crystal Sword
fields.short_description: Sword fashioned from pure crystal; a deed impossible for a human.
fields.description:
Sword fashioned from pure crystal; a deed impossible for a human.

Enwreathed with powerful magic, its attack scales with intelligence.

fields.name: Royal Greatsword
fields.short_description: Greatsword decorated in royal Carian style. Favored weapon of Blaidd the Half-Wolf.
fields.description:
Greatsword decorated in royal Carian style. Favored weapon of Blaidd the Half-Wolf.

In defiance of the fate he was born to, Blaidd swore to serve no master but Ranni. As proof, the sword was imbued with a cold magic at the moment the oath was sworn.

fields.name: Ruins Greatsword
fields.short_description: Originally rubble from a ruin which fell from the sky, this surviving fragment was honed into a weapon. One of the legendary armaments.
fields.description:
Originally rubble from a ruin which fell from the sky, this surviving fragment was honed into a weapon. One of the legendary armaments.

The ruin it came from crumbled when struck by a meteorite, as such this weapon harbors its destructive power.

fields.name: Rusted Anchor
fields.short_description: A rusty anchor wielded as a weapon. Each of its four flukes is thick and sharp, enabling piercing attacks.
fields.description:
A rusty anchor wielded as a weapon. Each of its four flukes is thick and sharp, enabling piercing attacks.

When the Tarnished left the Lands Between with their Lord, one boat alone was said to have been left behind.

fields.name: Sacred Relic Sword
fields.short_description: Sword wrought from the remains of a god who should have lived a life eternal.
fields.description:
Sword wrought from the remains of a god who should have lived a life eternal.

Thoughts on what the weapon portends are many and varied. Some consider it the mark of a great sin, or a sign of great devastation. Some think it as the end of an age, while others; the beginning.

fields.name: Sacrificial Axe
fields.short_description: Hatchet used in ancient sacrificial rite. A Deathbird is depicted as a malevolent deity.
fields.description:
Hatchet used in ancient sacrificial rite. A Deathbird is depicted as a malevolent deity.

The power of the rite yet lingers. A small amount of FP is restored upon slaying a foe.

fields.name: Scavenger_s Curved Sword
fields.short_description: Unique curved sword, notched like shark's teeth. Weapon carried by corpse pillagers who prowl the sites of old battles.
fields.description:
Unique curved sword, notched like shark's teeth. Weapon carried by corpse pillagers who prowl the sites of old battles.

The blade is tacky with blood and covered in hefty nicks, making it totally uneven. Life can be sinister indeed.

fields.name: Scimitar
fields.short_description: A curved sword with a single-sided blade. Delivers slashing attacks with its sharp blade, but is ineffective against thick armor and hides covered in tough scales.
fields.description:
A curved sword with a single-sided blade. Delivers slashing attacks with its sharp blade, but is ineffective against thick armor and hides covered in tough scales.

Smaller in size than most curved swords, it carves into enemies with quick, sharp cuts.

fields.name: Scorpion_s Stinger
fields.short_description: Dagger fashioned from a great scorpion's tail, glistening with scarlet rot.
fields.description:
Dagger fashioned from a great scorpion's tail, glistening with scarlet rot.

A ceremonial tool used by heretics, crafted from the relic of a sealed outer god.

fields.name: Sentry_s Torch
fields.short_description: Torch given to protectors of the Erdtree. Its flames are bestowed with a special incantation which allows the bearer to see assassins cloaked in veils. Furnished on behalf of the Erdtree and the Gr...
fields.description: Torch given to protectors of the Erdtree. Its flames are bestowed with a special incantation which allows the bearer to see assassins cloaked in veils. Furnished on behalf of the Erdtree and the Grace-Given Lord such that a Night of Black Knives will never come again.

fields.name: Serpent-God_s Curved Sword
fields.short_description: Curved sword fashioned in the image of an ancient serpent deity and tool of a forgotten religion practiced on Mt. Gelmir.
fields.description:
Curved sword fashioned in the image of an ancient serpent deity and tool of a forgotten religion practiced on Mt. Gelmir.

Formerly used to offer up sacrifices, this sword restores HP upon slaying an enemy.

fields.name: Serpent-Hunter
fields.short_description: Weapon that serves as both greatsword and spear. Thought to have been used to hunt an immortal great serpent in the distant past, it manifests a long blade of light when facing such a creature. Whe...
fields.description: Weapon that serves as both greatsword and spear. Thought to have been used to hunt an immortal great serpent in the distant past, it manifests a long blade of light when facing such a creature. When their master's heroic aspirations degenerated into mere greed, his men searched for a weapon with which they might halt their lord.

fields.name: Serpentbone Blade
fields.short_description: Sinister katana modeled after a serpent bone.
fields.description:
Sinister katana modeled after a serpent bone.

The densely packed row of spines that jut away from the cutting edge are coated in a lethal poison.

fields.name: Shamshir
fields.short_description: Curved sword with a thin blade of ample length. Light of weight despite its larger size, its slicing attacks come in rapid succession.
fields.description:
Curved sword with a thin blade of ample length. Light of weight despite its larger size, its slicing attacks come in rapid succession.

A devastatingly powerful weapon in the hands of a skilled swordsman.

fields.name: Short Sword
fields.short_description: A short straight sword with a short blade. In addition to its reliable standard damage, this weapon also boasts powerful piercing attacks.
fields.description:
A short straight sword with a short blade. In addition to its reliable standard damage, this weapon also boasts powerful piercing attacks.

Lightweight amongst straight swords, this weapon is easy to wield, requiring only humble attributes.

fields.name: Shotel
fields.short_description: Curved sword with a severely hooked blade. Its attacks can slip through an enemy's guard.
fields.description:
Curved sword with a severely hooked blade. Its attacks can slip through an enemy's guard.

Made to hunt down humans, this weapon requires high dexterity to wield effectively.

fields.name: Siluria_s Tree
fields.short_description: Siluria's Tree, weapon of one of the two honored as foremost among the Crucible Knights.
fields.description:
Siluria's Tree, weapon of one of the two honored as foremost among the Crucible Knights.

The primordial form of the Erdtree is close in nature to life itself, and this spear, modeled on its crucible, is imbued with ancient holy essence.

fields.name: Spiked Caestus
fields.short_description: A caestus with the rivets replaced by blood loss-inducing spikes.
fields.description:
A caestus with the rivets replaced by blood loss-inducing spikes.

Fist weapons come in pairs, and two-handing this weapon will equip it to both hands.

fields.name: St. Trina_s Torch
fields.short_description: Candlestand torch that burns with a light-purple flame. The carvings depict St. Trina, but in adult form, somewhat unnervingly.
fields.description:
Candlestand torch that burns with a light-purple flame. The carvings depict St. Trina, but in adult form, somewhat unnervingly.

The light-purple flame induces sleep.

fields.name: Starscourge Greatsword
fields.short_description: Curved greatswords of black steel wielded by General Radahn. A pair of weapons decorated with a lion mane motif.
fields.description:
Curved greatswords of black steel wielded by General Radahn. A pair of weapons decorated with a lion mane motif.

Radahn earned considerable renown as the Starscourge in his youth, and it is said that it was during this time he engraved the gravity crest upon these blades.

fields.name: Steel-Wire Torch
fields.short_description: Torch wound with metal wire. The flame can illuminate dark locales, or be used to attack enemies.
fields.description:
Torch wound with metal wire. The flame can illuminate dark locales, or be used to attack enemies.

Heavier than a normal torch, but the heated filament boosts fire damage dealt.

fields.name: Sword of Milos
fields.short_description: Sinister greatsword fashioned from a giant's backbone. The spines along each side of the blade have been tapered to a fine point and mete out wounds like a lopsided saw-blade.
fields.description:
Sinister greatsword fashioned from a giant's backbone. The spines along each side of the blade have been tapered to a fine point and mete out wounds like a lopsided saw-blade.

Milos was undersized for a giant, and was viewed as sullied and terribly grotesque.

fields.name: Sword of Night and Flame
fields.short_description: Storied sword and treasure of Caria Manor. One of the legendary armaments.
fields.description:
Storied sword and treasure of Caria Manor. One of the legendary armaments.

Astrologers, who preceded the sorcerers, established themselves in mountaintops that nearly touched the sky, and considered the Fire Giants their neighbors.

fields.name: Sword of St. Trina
fields.short_description: Silver sword carried by clerics of St. Trina. Inflicts sleep ailment upon foes.
fields.description:
Silver sword carried by clerics of St. Trina. Inflicts sleep ailment upon foes.

St. Trina is an enigmatic figure. Some say she is a comely young girl, others are sure he is a boy. The only certainty is that their appearance was as sudden as their disappearance.

fields.name: Torch
fields.short_description: This torch's tip is wrapped in oil-soaked rags and set on fire. The flame can illuminate dark locales, or be used to attack enemies.
fields.description:
This torch's tip is wrapped in oil-soaked rags and set on fire. The flame can illuminate dark locales, or be used to attack enemies.

Can be raised up when equipped in the left hand, illuminating more of the surrounding area.

fields.name: Troll Knight_s Sword
fields.short_description: Greatsword embedded with a blue glintstone. Weapon of the trolls in service to the royal family of Caria. Called into service when the Queen invoked an oath they swore, the trolls are treated as tr...
fields.description: Greatsword embedded with a blue glintstone. Weapon of the trolls in service to the royal family of Caria. Called into service when the Queen invoked an oath they swore, the trolls are treated as true knights of Caria, and fight arm in arm with their human comrades.

fields.name: Twinblade
fields.short_description: A sword with blades on both sides of the hilt. This weapon is difficult to wield and demands high dexterity.
fields.description:
A sword with blades on both sides of the hilt. This weapon is difficult to wield and demands high dexterity.

Can be wielded with a single hand, but its true strength is unlocked with dual-handed spinning attacks.

fields.name: Twinned Knight Swords
fields.short_description: An attractive twinblade of fine make that prizes the chivalric way.
fields.description:
An attractive twinblade of fine make that prizes the chivalric way.

Can be wielded with a single hand, but its true strength is unlocked with dual-handed spinning attacks.

fields.name: Uchigatana
fields.short_description: A katana with a long single-edged curved blade. A unique weapon wielded by the samurai from the Land of Reeds.
fields.description:
A katana with a long single-edged curved blade. A unique weapon wielded by the samurai from the Land of Reeds.

The blade, with its undulating design, boasts extraordinary sharpness, and its slash attacks cause blood loss.

fields.name: Urumi
fields.short_description: This weapon made of extremely thin, flexible blades of metal is wielded like a whip by Nightfolk warriors.
fields.description:
This weapon made of extremely thin, flexible blades of metal is wielded like a whip by Nightfolk warriors.

Though in essence a whip with a cutting edge, it can also be used as a spear to pierce foes.

fields.name: Veteran_s Prosthesis
fields.short_description: Bladed prosthetic leg enwreathed with the power of lightning, instead attached to the fist. Commander Niall, veteran of Castle Sol, offered this prosthesis in exchange for the lives of defeated kni...
fields.description: Bladed prosthetic leg enwreathed with the power of lightning, instead attached to the fist. Commander Niall, veteran of Castle Sol, offered this prosthesis in exchange for the lives of defeated knights held prisoner. He went on to lead these men as an army of no nation.

fields.name: Wakizashi
fields.short_description: Short sword with a tempering pattern on the blade. A weapon unique to warriors of the Land of Reeds. Afflicts targets with blood loss.
fields.description:
Short sword with a tempering pattern on the blade. A weapon unique to warriors of the Land of Reeds. Afflicts targets with blood loss.

These swords are considered auxiliary weapons. Yet, one man is known to wield this weapon in his left hand while using a full-sized katana in his right. A demonic swordsman known only as Okina.

fields.name: Warhawk_s Talon
fields.short_description: Talon-swords are affixed to the legs of Stormveil's warhawks, but this one has been repurposed for human use.
fields.description:
Talon-swords are affixed to the legs of Stormveil's warhawks, but this one has been repurposed for human use.

The blade is thin and lightweight so as not to obstruct the hawk's mobility.

fields.name: Warped Axe
fields.short_description: Oversized double-headed axe with a bizarre, almost melted appearance.
fields.description:
Oversized double-headed axe with a bizarre, almost melted appearance.

Brute strength is the only thing required to wield this weapon, which appears to have taken quite the beating itself.

fields.name: Warpick
fields.short_description: Warhammer with a hard protruding beak. A pickaxe designed for combat, in essence.
fields.description:
Warhammer with a hard protruding beak. A pickaxe designed for combat, in essence.

A simple but highly effective weapon, the weighty piercing attack casually rips through metal armor.

fields.name: Watchdog_s Greatsword
fields.short_description: Stone greatsword wielded by Erdtree Burial Watchdogs.
fields.description:
Stone greatsword wielded by Erdtree Burial Watchdogs.

Though decorated with the watchman's eye, the pupil was taken by graverobbers and is now hollow, leaving this sword a mere lump of stone.

fields.name: Weathered Straight Sword
fields.short_description: Straight sword with a rather short but wide blade. Simple to wield, it was known as the sword of the people.
fields.description:
Straight sword with a rather short but wide blade. Simple to wield, it was known as the sword of the people.

Though the Erdtree styling is still visible, time has not been kind to this sword, now merely a shadow of its former self.

fields.name: Wing of Astel
fields.short_description: Sword fashioned from a delicate wing, suffused with the magic of the stars. Strong attack unleashes a wave of enchanted light.
fields.description:
Sword fashioned from a delicate wing, suffused with the magic of the stars. Strong attack unleashes a wave of enchanted light.

Crafted from a relic of the Naturalborn of the Void who is said to have assailed the Eternal City.

fields.name: Zamor Curved Sword
fields.short_description: Weapon wielded by the knights of Zamor who earned great renown during the War against the Giants.
fields.description:
Weapon wielded by the knights of Zamor who earned great renown during the War against the Giants.

In apparent devotion to winter, the curved blade is styled after an icy wind and imbued with a powerful frost effect.

Mending Rune of the Fell Curse
